Dear {!SFDC_520_Quote__c.Implementation_Manager__c},
Welcome to the Haystak Team! Thank you for providing us your information and being on the call today. Our onboarding process is currently underway!
In the next 10-15 business days we will schedule a second call with your assigned Account Manager and Onboarding Specialist. During this second call (Launch Call) we will review your set up information, activate your account, and answer any other questions you may have.
As a reminder the following information is crucial to ensure your account goes live correctly.
[Items missing reminder bullet points]
If you have any information that you think may help us with your onboarding process please email onboarding@haystak.com.
Thank you again for choosing Haystak Digital and we look forward to working with you.
Sincerely,
Haystak Digital Team!
